overview: January 6, 1985,The Orange Bowl - Miami, FL NFL '84 Pre-Game (NBC) - Bob Costas, Pete Axthelm, Bill Macatee, Ahmad Rashad Game Announcers,(NBC) - Dick Enberg, Merlin Olsen 1984 was the 18th season in football for the Miami Dolphins and the fifteenth for coach Don Shula with the club. T Marino's passing ability became the focal point of Miami's offense and in 1984 he exploded to set league records with 5,084 passing yards and 48 touchdowns.
title: 1984 Pittsburgh at Miami AFC Championship
